backend/main.mo: Defines profile, like, match, and chat data types with comparison logic, manages profiles, likes, matches, chat messages, and enforces authorization and storage via mixins.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists concise descriptions of all frontend components, hooks, screens, utilities, and configuration files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_MAINNET.md: Mainnet deployment guide describing prerequisites and steps for deploying PadelMatch to IC.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based OKLCH color theme definitions for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint with PWA meta tags, manifest, icons, and PlayPal branding.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, colors, display mode, and logo assets.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing versioned caching with install, activate, and fetch handlers using mixed network/cache strategies.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React entry deciding between login, profile setup, or authenticated app shell based on identity and profile state.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Authenticated app container providing navigation, screen state, chat handling, and unread message badges.
frontend/src/components/ChatMessageBubbl: Renders a chat message bubble with styling based on message ownership and displays formatted timestamp.
frontend/src/components/DiscoverCard.tsx: Displays a user profile card with avatar, name, level, badges, bio, availability, and match stats.
Provides UI controls to filter profiles by minimum level, maximum level, and zone.
frontend/src/components/LevelStars.tsx: Shows up to five star icons filled according to a player's level.
frontend/src/components/ProfilePhotoUplo: Handles image file selection and uploads profile photos with progress tracking and validation.
frontend/src/components/UserAvatar.tsx: Displays a user's photo or a fallback icon with gradient background.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on identity, refreshing dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context for Internet Identity, managing login, stored identities, and status.
frontend/src/hooks/useMessageNotificatio: Polls for new chat messages, tracks unread counts per sender, caches sender names, and manages read state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for profiles, photos, discovery, likes, chat, and related mutations tied to an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with light/dark theme CSS variables and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React root, wraps the app with query and Internet Identity providers, and loads global styles.
frontend/src/screens/ChatScreen.tsx: Chat UI screen that loads messages, displays recipient profile, and sends new chat messages.
frontend/src/screens/DiscoverScreen.tsx: User discovery screen with swipe-like candidate browsing, filters, and like/pass actions.
frontend/src/screens/EditProfileScreen.t: Form screen for editing a user profile and submitting updates via mutation.
frontend/src/screens/LoginScreen.tsx: Login screen prompting the user to authenticate using Internet Identity with branding and UI elements.
frontend/src/screens/MatchesScreen.tsx: Shows the user's match list and renders match cards that load each match's profile with chat and profile actions.
Displays a detailed view of another user's profile with loading, error, and not-found states.
frontend/src/screens/ProfileScreen.tsx: Displays the logged-in user's profile with editing support, photo upload, stats, and availability info.
Form for creating a new user profile including basic info, level, position, availability, and bio.
frontend/src/screens/SettingsScreen.tsx: Provides account settings including logout and app info sections.
frontend/src/utils/profileMappings.ts: Maps profile enums to numbers or Spanish labels for display.
frontend/src/utils/unreadMessagesStore.t: Manages localStorage-based state for unread messages keyed by user principal.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear stored or hash-based values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config extending colors, typography, animations, and container settings with custom plugins and themes.
project_state.json: Defines the PlayPal project state, including logo requirements, deployment issues, and pending feature requests for restoring and replacing the logo.
